B2 relating to the teeth: dental decay/treatment
More examplesFewer examplesHave you made an appointment for your next dental check-up?Pregnant women don't have to pay dental charges under the current health system.She had to cancel her dental appointment.I had some very expensive dental treatment recently - but it'll save me problems in the future.There are only two dental practices in the town and another one is badly needed.
